languages.text: "Спасибо, {name}. Ты дал{mf||а} нам хорошую игрушку. Мы покинем тебя пока — нам еще предстоит одолеть то, что занимает наше будущее вместилище. Но знай — когда ты встретишься с великой бедой, мы придем".
"Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we have yet to subdue that which occupies our future vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."
languages.original_text: "Спасибо, {name}. Ты дал{mf||а} нам хорошую игрушку. Мы покинем тебя пока — нам еще предстоит одолеть то, что занимает наше будущее вместилище. Но знай — когда ты встретишься с великой бедой, мы придем".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we have yet to subdue that which occupies our future vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, {name}. You gave us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we must work on our new vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we have yet to subdue that which occupies our future vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we must work on our new vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we have yet to subdue that which occupies our future vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we have yet to subdue that which occupies our future vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait

languages.text: 「ありがとう{name}。あなたは良いものをくれた。しばらくはここを離れる。我々はまだ、我らの未来の船を占拠しているものを征服するに至っていない。でも、大きな試練が訪れた時にはそうと分かる。それは我々も同じ」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we have yet to subdue that which occupies our future vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとう{name}。あなたは良いものをくれた。しばらくはここを離れる。我々はまだ、我らの未来の船を占拠しているものを征服するに至っていない。でも、大きな試練が訪れた時にはそうと分かる。それは我々も同じ」
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait

languages.text: “谢谢你，{name}，你给我们带来了不错的玩具。我们暂时要离开你了，我们还没有制服占据我们未来身躯的东西。不过，我们向你保证，当伟大的试炼到来时，我们会再次归来。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we have yet to subdue that which occupies our future vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，{name}，你给我们带来了不错的玩具。我们暂时要离开你了，我们还没有制服占据我们未来身躯的东西。不过，我们向你保证，当伟大的试炼到来时，我们会再次归来。”
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait

languages.text: "Danke, {name}. Ihr habt uns ein gutes Spielzeug gegeben. Wir verlassen Euch nun ... schließlich müssen wir noch jenen bezwingen, der unser zukünftiges Schiff besetzt. Doch wisset, wenn die große Prüfung kommt, kommen auch wir."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we have yet to subdue that which occupies our future vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, {name}. Ihr habt uns ein gutes Spielzeug gegeben. Wir verlassen Euch nun — wir müssen an unserem neuen Schiff arbeiten. Doch wisset, wenn die große Prüfung kommt, kommen auch wir."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait

languages.text: « Merci, {name}. Vous nous offrez un joli cadeau. Nous vous laissons pour le moment, car nous devons encore soumettre ce qui occupe notre futur réceptacle. Mais sachez que lorsque viendra la grande épreuve, nous serons présents. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we have yet to subdue that which occupies our future vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, {name}. Vous nous offrez un joli cadeau. Nous vous laissons pour le moment, car nous devons encore soumettre ce qui occupe notre futur réceptacle. Mais sachez que lorsque viendra la grande épreuve, nous serons présents. »
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait

languages.text: «Gracias, {name}. Nos ha proporcionado un buen juguete. Nos retiraremos, pues; debemos doblegar aquello que ocupa nuestro nuevo cuerpo. Pero no le quepa duda de que estaremos aquí cuando llegue la gran ordalía».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we have yet to subdue that which occupies our future vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, {name}. Nos ha proporcionado un buen juguete. Nos retiraremos, pues; debemos doblegar aquello que ocupa nuestro nuevo cuerpo. Pero no le quepa duda de que estaremos aquí cuando llegue la gran ordalía».
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait

languages.text: "Teşekkürler {name}. Bize çok güzel bir oyuncak verdiniz. Sizi şimdilik yalnız bırakacağız... Müstakbel konağımızı işgal edene boyun eğdirmeliyiz. Ancak şunu bilin: Büyük imtihan gelip çattığında biz de orada olacağız."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, {name}. You have given us a good toy. We will leave you for now — we have yet to subdue that which occupies our future vessel. But know that when the great trial comes, so will we."

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkürler {name}. Bize çok güzel bir oyuncak verdiniz. Sizi şimdilik yalnız bırakacağız... Müstakbel konağımızı işgal edene henüz boyun eğdirmedik. Ancak şu bilin: Büyük imtihan gelip çattığında biz de geleceğiz."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_Portrait
